definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

sentences.english: The landlady found they had been illegally subletting the flat.
sentences.chinese: 女房东发现他们一直在违法转租公寓。

sentences.english: "He's been in his room all day, " the landlady said downstairs.
sentences.chinese: “他已经在屋里呆了一整天，”女房东在楼下说。

sentences.english: I moved becasue I can't put up with that officious landlady any longer.
sentences.chinese: 我搬家是因为我再也受不了那个好管闲事的女房东了。

sentences.english: They debated whether or not the landlady should charge him for the water.
sentences.chinese: 他们争论那个女房东是否应该收取他的水费。

sentences.english: The landlady turned out a tenant for not paying the rent .
sentences.chinese: 女房东赶走了一名不交房租的房客。

sentences.english: I moved because I can't put up with that officious landlady any longer.
sentences.chinese: 我搬家是因为我再也受不了那个好管闲事的女房东了。

sentences.english: The landlady looked through the keyhole.
sentences.chinese: 女房东从钥匙孔儿往屋里看。

sentences.english: On Sundays, his landlady provided dinner as well as breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 逢星期天，女房东除早饭外还供应他正餐。

sentences.english: The landlady always wore a dress with delicate lace.
sentences.chinese: 女房东总是穿着带精致花边的裙子。

sentences.english: "Oh, no, " said the landlady, "there's a bucket of sand in every room.
sentences.chinese: 女房东说“不可能，每个房间里都有一桶沙子”。

sentences.english: My landlady is a very good cooker.
sentences.chinese: 我的女房东是个很好的煮菜机。

sentences.english: A:It was the woman I boarded with last year in Philadelphia.She wants to play matchmaker.
sentences.chinese: 是去年在费城我住宿的女房东，她要作媒。

sentences.english: The landlady complains of his staying up late at night.
sentences.chinese: 女房东对他的熬夜表示不满。

sentences.english: We hear her tread softly back down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到了女房东悄悄走下楼梯的声音。

sentences.english: This is Mrs. White, my landlady.
sentences.chinese: 这是怀特太太，我的女房东。

sentences.english: How did you get a loan with your landlady?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何从你女房东那里得到贷款的？

definition: to rent jointly with other people/co-renting
